Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Boola : “ndilinda khu Nyasaye Omulesi owa mabwibwi,”
Okhurulana nende obusuku obwa bilia ebiayaloonga
Nende okhurulana khu obusuku bwabalia bafuririranga amafundikho
Nende khu obusuku	bwa weyishinda olwaba nakhola eshikhalikhali
